name: WKSnapshotReason
desc: The reason for a background snapshot task.

items.name: case appBackgrounded
items.desc: The app transitioned from the foreground to the background.

items.name: case complicationUpdate
items.desc: The app updated the complication timeline.

items.name: case prelaunch
items.desc: The system needs a snapshot for the dock, but the app has not been launched yet.

items.name: case returnToDefaultState
items.desc: It has been more than an hour since the user’s last interaction with the app; the app’s snapshot should return to its default state.
